description:
""Things are going very well, things like 
producing 'childhood death'"", says @BillGatesðŸ˜ˆ discussing #PopulationControl.

After the scandalous Ted talk where Bill Gates is saying, ""First, we've got population. The world today has 6.8 billion people. That's headed up to about nine billion. Now, if we do a really great job on new #Vaccines, #Healthcare, reproductive health services, we could lower that 
by, perhaps, 10 or 15%..."" I am taking this fragment to make a critique about what Bill Gates is saying. I made a subtitle for the Romanian audience. 
The movie was taken from here 
https://youtu.be/CfTTc61vc4c
